assignments.name: 3. Techniques for Selecting Artwork
assignments.description: We learned how the selection tools work in illustrator, especially objects and anchor points. We also learned how to change the colors of things and adjust the positions of things

assignments.name: 4. Make a Logo with Shapes
assignments.description: We learned how illustrator's shape tools. We learned how to make basic2 shapes, make stars, round rectangles, and more.

assignments.name: 5. Editing and Combining Shapes and Paths
assignments.description: We learned about the pathfinding and shape combing tools illustrator offers. We also learned about making our own curves.

assignments.name: 6. Character Creation (cat)
assignments.description: We continued to learn more about illustrators tools for making designs. We learned about illustrators layer system and how to pick colors.

assignments.name: 8. Graphic Creation Choice Project 1
assignments.description: We were given free choice of what we would need to do for the project, focused on making stickers. I made two stickers with a robotics theme. They were heavy on layers and the pathfinder.
